descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...four black boxes and two blue boxes.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...double in width and long way it is bigger times three.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...take the original shape from the input box and turn it counter clockwise and replicate that on the top 4x2 section of the output grid. Then reverse the shape and do that 4 more times

descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... double in width and triple in length
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... flip and mirror input grid to the bottom right of the output. Then mirror for the bottom left. Flip to make the middle left, mirror for the middle right. Flip for top left, mirror for top right.
